name: Buller
description:
The game is about elemental swaps. Avoid bullets of the different elements to survive and kill enemies with your own style.  The game can be played only with at least 2 inputs (e.g. gamepad + gamepad +... / keyboard + gamepad +...) 

Highly recommended to use some software for gamepad inputs like ds4windows or reWASD

For GamePad layout:

Use north/west/south/east buttons to swap between elements and use sticks for movement and aim controls. R1/RB to shoot.

For Keyboard:

1,2,3,4 for elemental swaps. WASD to move, arrows to aim, and SPACE to shoot.
